bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: The Wolverine Soap Company of Portland, Michigan were makers of fine toiletries and soaps.
Hiter Camden Witt (1857-1941) was authorized by the company to sell their products. His retail establishment in Charlottesville is unknown; there's no indication of it in the city directories.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This is a certificate of agency for the Wolverine Soap Company authorizing Hiter Camden Witt as their agent in Charlottesville, Va.
